field.label: Description
field.help: Add an optional description for this route-map.

field.label: Name
field.help: Route-map name to match and set your patterns, it will be enabled via the neighbor configuration.

field.label: Action
field.help: Set permit for match or deny to negate the rule.

field.label: ID
field.help: Route-map ID between 1 and 65535. Be aware that the sorting will be done under the hood, so when you add an entry between it get's to the right position

field.label: Set
field.help: Free text field for your set, please be careful! You can set e.g. "local-preference 300" or "community 1:1" (http://www.nongnu.org/quagga/docs/docs-multi/Route-Map-Set-Command.html#Route-Map-Set-Command)
